mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, mail, phone, user_name, user_pass, sex, icon, role FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( user_id, mail, phone, user_name, user_pass, sex, icon, role) values (#{userId},#{mail},#{phone},#{userName},#{userPass},#{sex},#{icon},#{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET mail = #{mail}, phone = #{phone}, user_name = #{userName}, user_pass = #{userPass}, sex = #{sex}, icon = #{icon}, role = #{role} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
